name: Follow my Light
description:
-Controls:

  • W A S D to move or Arrow Key
  • F to interact with the buttons
  • Shift to "Light Up" your character

Your Goal is to reach (both the shadow and the player) a spot marked with red or sometimes it is hidden and you have to find the right place to go to.

The shadow will go to the nearest light they find.

You have limited uses of "Light Up" and if the shadow reaches your light, you might not be able to use it again.
